channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Maid
channel.description:
The Maid Blue Dragon Support
Passives:
Dutiful Description: Immune to Occupation
Day Abilities:
Cleaning Service Usage Amount: 3 Description: You clean a player’s room, clearing their journal while leaving the room sparkling clean.
Night Abilities:
Late Night Room Service Usage Amount: Infinite Description: Substitute your target for yourself. Visitors of the target will instead target you. A log of Visitors are sent to the Maid’s target.
Private Night Usage Amount: 3 Description: Speak to your target directly and all visitors will be prevented from visiting.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Maid
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
That is why Im probably going to change it to a journal peek or change the abilty entirely. Most likely into the “See two players who used day abilities at the end of the day” or “See all players who used day abilities at the end of the day” would actually help out BD and execute assassins/cult leaders if they arent careful with the bleeds/poisons.

Edit: me no like how my threads close

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Maid
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Margaret:

Its only for trolling to be honest.

Then remove it
If an ability doesn’t meaningfully contribute it doesn’t need to exist

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Maid
item.dc:creator: Margaret
item.description:
Its only for trolling to be honest. Only helpful when destroying some fake “evidence” cough cough Mastermind cough and can get people executed quickly. Might change to neutral and make it a psychotic maid. Or I could change the journal clear into a journal peek. Either way, psychotic maid still sounds nice. Other option is to make the maid be able to know who used Day Abilities at the end of the day. Doesnt tell classes, just names. Would be able to out the Assassin if they arent careful.

Read full topic

item.description:
mfw someone else makes a Maid class
